name: Storylane
headline: Build Interactive Product Demo in 10 mins for SaaS companies
description: Storylane enables marketing and sales teams to create and share interactive product demos in 10 min. Prospective buyers can self-experience the demos without talking to sales. Our no-code platform allows teams (without any engineering help) to capture, personalize, add guides and publish a demo. These Demos can be embedded on websites, email campaigns or sales followups.

founders.name: Akash Bansal, Founder
founders.description: Founded Kinderlime, the largest preschool SaaS platform, ran it for 7 years and then sold it in 2019 to Warburg Pincus. Product and Pre-sales at Rambus (high speed signalling), worked at multiple networking hardware startups. Obsesses over customers, mission driven teams and product.

founders.name: Nalin Senthamil, Founder
founders.description:
Nalin is technologist and product driven entrepreneur with more than 15+ years of experience in machine learning.  He is now Founder of Storylane. Prior to that, he co-founded Kinderlime (acquired by Warburg), an early education platform for schools. 

He was CTO at DAQRI building AR wearable product for industrial applications and led teams of 150+.  And, before that he built the first product recognition app for Amazon and was granted many patents.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Storylane**

Founded in 2021 and part of the Y Combinator S21 batch, Storylane provides a no-code platform designed to help SaaS companies create and share interactive product demos in just 10 minutes. Located in Santa Clara, CA, and boasting a team of 40, Storylane aims to empower marketing and sales teams by allowing potential customers to self-explore product features without needing to engage sales personnel directly.

**Mission:** 
To build compelling interactive product demonstrations in a matter of minutes, seamlessly integrating into various outreach efforts like email campaigns and website embeds.

**Key Features:**
- **Guided Demos:** Help drive product-led growth, allowing potential buyers to interact with features directly.
- **Sandbox Demos:** Create a virtual environment for customers to play with your product, which can significantly influence their buying decision.
- **Demo Hub:** A centralized location where users can address multiple use cases, enhancing customer experience.

**Technology and Integration:**
Storylane‚Äôs platform leverages a powerful browser extension to capture product flows, allowing users to make edits without needing HTML or coding skills. By personalizing demos, adding guides, and analyzing performance metrics, users can fine-tune their outreach and sales strategies effectively. The platform also offers integrations with popular tools like Salesforce, HubSpot, and more.

**Customer Success:**
Storylane has been instrumental for numerous companies in enhancing demo engagement and conversion rates. For example, Upland Software experienced a remarkable increase in leads and engagement, while SentinelOne saved substantial demo time using Storylane's tools.

**Team and Leadership:**
Under the guidance of Aaron Epstein as Group Partner, the company maintains a forward-thinking approach that clearly resonates with over 3000 sales and marketing teams who have adopted their platform.

**Impact:**
The results speak for themselves, with many customers reporting a 35% boost in their sales pipeline and up to a 45% increase in sales velocity, illustrating how effective and crucial Storylane's solution can be in the competitive SaaS landscape. 

For those interested in capturing and engaging potential clients with interactive experiences, Storylane is poised to redefine how demos are done. Check them out at [Storylane.io](https://www.storylane.io) and explore how you can transform your sales processes today. 

**In Summary:** Storylane enables companies to craft interactive product demos quickly and easily, enhancing customer engagement and closing deals faster. Their intuitive platform is the ultimate solution for modern sales teams who want to leverage SaaS offerings effectively.
